mapper.select: SELECT menu.userId, user.userName, menuId, amSnack, amSnackImgUrl, lunch, lunchImgUrl, pmSnack, pmSnackImgUrl, menu.createDate FROM menu, (select classCode from user where userId = #{userId}) as tmp, user WHERE menu.classCode = tmp.classCode and user.userId = menu.userId ORDER BY createDate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT menu.userId, user.userName, menuId, amSnack, amSnackImgUrl, lunch, lunchImgUrl, pmSnack, pmSnackImgUrl, menu.createDate FROM menu, user WHERE menu.menuId = #{id} and user.userId = menu.userId
